Name: Initial Timeline Load
Description: Open timeline for a patient and verify records load and render
Prerequisites: Timeline page opened for patient with multiple historical records
Expected Output: Timeline renders grouped entries by year and month; most recent items at top; no errors

Name: Group By Year Month
Description: Verify timeline groups records into year and month buckets
Prerequisites: Timeline contains records spanning multiple years and months
Expected Output: Records are grouped under correct year and month headings; counts match DB

Name: Server-Side Aggregation
Description: Confirm server returns pre-processed grouped payload to reduce client work
Expected Output: Server returns grouped data structure; client renders without additional grouping

Name: Filter Timeline By Date Range
Description: Apply start and end date filters and verify only records in range shown
Prerequisites: Timeline has records before; within; after range
Expected Output: Only records with date >= start and <= end are displayed; group headers update accordingly

Name: Filter Timeline By Specialty
Description: Apply specialty filter (e.g.
Prerequisites: Cardiology) and verify timeline shows only related visits
Expected Output: Timeline contains visits across specialties
Actual Output: Only visits tagged Cardiology are shown; other visits hidden

Name: Search Patient Visits By Keyword
Description: Search timeline for keyword in notes and verify matches
Expected Output: Results include visits where notes contain keyword; context snippet shown

Name: Filter By Visit Type
Description: Filter timeline by visit type (consultation; follow-up; lab) and verify results
Expected Output: Only visits matching selected types are displayed

Name: Pagination and Infinite Scroll
Description: Scroll through timeline with many records and verify pagination or infinite load works
Expected Output: Next page loads on scroll or page navigation; no duplicates; order preserved

Name: Empty Timeline State
Description: Open timeline for patient with no history and verify UI state
Expected Output: UI shows empty state message 'No history available' and call-to-action if applicable

Name: Attachment Indicator
Description: Verify timeline entries with uploaded records show attachment icon
Prerequisites: Some visits have uploaded PDFs or images
Expected Output: Entries with attachments display icon; clicking opens attachment viewer

Name: Appointment Detail Expand
Description: Click an entry to expand appointment details and verify content
Prerequisites: Timeline entry exists with full details
Expected Output: Expanded view shows date; clinician; notes; attachments; prescriptions

Name: Link To Visit Notes
Description: From timeline entry open full visit notes and verify navigation
Expected Output: Click opens notes editor or read-only view with full content

Name: Filter Persistence On Navigation
Description: Apply filters then navigate away and back; verify filters persist
Prerequisites: Filters applied; navigate to another page then return
Expected Output: Filters remain applied; timeline shows same filtered results

Name: Filter Persistence On Refresh
Description: Apply filters then refresh browser; verify filters persist via query params
Expected Output: URL contains filter query params; refresh reproduces same filtered view

Name: URL Share Reproduces Filters
Description: Copy timeline URL with filters and open in new session; verify same view
Expected Output: Visiting URL reproduces identical filtered timeline for authorized user

Name: Timezone Handling
Description: Verify timeline dates respect user's timezone and DST boundaries
Prerequisites: Timeline contains records across DST change
Expected Output: Displayed dates/times reflect user's selected timezone; records included correctly

Name: Performance Under Load
Description: Measure timeline load time with large dataset and verify responsiveness
Prerequisites: Test environment seeded with thousands of records
Expected Output: Initial render within SLA e.g. <2s; UI remains responsive during interactions

Name: Server Filter Correctness
Description: Apply complex filters server-side and verify DB where clause correctness
Expected Output: Returned records exactly match filter criteria; no extra records

Name: Filter Edge Case No Matches
Description: Apply filters that yield no results and verify empty state
Expected Output: UI shows 'No records found' and option to clear filters

Name: Concurrent Filter Sessions Isolation
Description: Two users apply different filters concurrently and verify isolation
Prerequisites: Two sessions viewing same patient timeline
Expected Output: Each session shows results according to its own filters; no cross-session leakage

Name: Live Update After New Visit
Description: Create a new visit record and verify timeline updates if live updates enabled
Prerequisites: New visit created in backend; user on timeline
Expected Output: Timeline shows new visit in correct group without full reload or after manual refresh

Name: Filter Input Validation
Description: Enter invalid filter values and verify validation
Prerequisites: User inputs malformed date or invalid enum
Expected Output: Client-side validation blocks submission; backend returns 400 for malformed requests

Name: Sorting Interaction With Filters
Description: Apply filters then change sort order and verify sorted filtered set
Expected Output: Filtered results reorder according to selected sort; pagination preserved

Name: Export Timeline Slice
Description: Request export of filtered timeline slice and verify exported data matches view
Expected Output: Export contains same records and metadata as shown in UI

Name: Accessibility Keyboard Navigation
Description: Navigate timeline and apply filters using keyboard only
Expected Output: All controls reachable and operable via keyboard; screen reader announces group headings and entries

Name: Mobile Responsive Behavior
Description: Open timeline on narrow viewport and verify layout and filters adapt
Expected Output: Groups collapse appropriately; filters accessible via modal; entries readable

Name: Search Debounce Behavior
Description: Type rapidly into live-search and verify debounce prevents excessive requests
Prerequisites: Live-search enabled on timeline keyword field
Expected Output: Backend receives debounced requests; UI updates smoothly

Name: Data Consistency After Restore
Description: Restore archived visit and verify it appears in timeline in correct position
Expected Output: Visit appears in timeline grouped by its original date and visible under filters

Name: Permission Enforcement On Timeline
Description: Attempt to view another patient's timeline without permission and verify access denied
Prerequisites: User lacks permission for target patient
Expected Output: UI shows access denied; no patient data exposed

Name: Audit Log Entry For Timeline Views
Description: Open timeline and verify server logs view action for audit
Expected Output: Audit log records user id patient id timestamp and action type
